relnotes.name: Bookmark Support
relnotes.purpose: A database for shared storage of web browser bookmarks.

defect.title: PREQ1182 submission has caused build failure

relnotes.preq: Phase-I of Preq-1182 GNU Make-based build system, Filename Policy check updations

defect.title: Tag Scan Report for the bookmarks Subsystem
Leavescan errors in Bookmarks production code

relnotes.defect: Fixed leavescan errors in Bookmarks production code

defect.title: Ineffective capability checking in bookmarkdb dll
Bookmarks are not restored after a backup from a Lily device

relnotes.defect: Added backup and restore functionality for the bookmark repository files

defect.title: Adding more OOM test for bookmark component

relnotes.defect: Added a new bookmark oom test code and fixed few memory leaks in component code

defect.title: Bookmarks test ( tbookmark_sec) is failing in armv5

relnotes.defect: Fix for a test code(tsecuritytest.cpp) for fixing the failing tbookmark_sec tests on armv5
